item.title: #TIL 2015-12-01 : Index is useless when use function on indexed field
item.description: Index is useless when use function on indexed field Reality, if using function on indexed field, you will broke indexing by accident. Eg: WHERE MONTH(`date`) = 11 AND YEAR(`date`) = 2015 Solution is transform the query to comparison query, like this : WHERE `date` >= '2015-11-01' AND `date` < '2015-12-01'
